channel.title: Ended game alive as Pret King and still lost (2.4c)
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was made King as Pretender and still lost at the end: https://imgur.com/a/l80n6s1
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to be amongst the winning people. Only cult got the win.
#### Steps to reproduce: I guess get kinged as pret and wait it out?
#### Comments:

item.title: Ended game alive as Pret King and still lost (2.4c)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Pretender King (and Sellsword, as your image shows them losing despite BD losing) not winning as intended is already known and should be fixed soon ^^

Is it possible you have logs from this game?

%userprofile%\appdata\LocalLow\Imperium42 Game Studio\Throne of Lies\

If you haven’t launched your game again since, can you upload Player.log here? If you’ve launched once since, can you upload Player-prev.log here?

Read full topic
